subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Hasheem Thabeet had 16 points and 12 rebounds as No. 2 Connecticut routed visiting Bryant, 88-58, giving Coach Jim Calhoun his 780th career victory.
snippet: Hasheem Thabeet had 16 points and 12 rebounds as No. 2 Connecticut routed visiting Bryant, 88-58, giving Coach Jim Calhoun his 780th career victory.
